title: Waxing Moon
summary: A build phase favoring steady momentum, gathering information, and making small course corrections.

meaning.headline: Momentum is growing—take measured steps and gather what you need.

frames.text: The waxing Moon supports building gradually rather than leaping ahead.
It’s a good time to collect information and test the next step.
This guarantees rapid progress if you push hard.

frictions: Rushing growth faster than it can hold

do: Take the next small, testable action.
Check for new information before scaling up.
Adjust pacing to keep growth steady.
avoid: Treating this as an all-or-nothing push

reusable_lines.text: Gather input and refine before you accelerate.

forbidden_claims: Linking progress to destiny or identity
Predicting specific outcomes from taking action now
allowed_framing: Agency-forward: “you can choose to test and adjust.”
Non-deterministic: “growing energy can support small expansions.”
